jobDescription: Data Scientist Job Description Simpli.fi is looking for experienced, analytically minded individuals to expanding their data science team. If you are interested you will have the following attributes: data oriented decision making abilitystatistical modeling and mathematical optimization experiencelinux and database data manipulation skillstask oriented preferencesuse some or all of the following tools: R, SQL, bash, Ruby, Perl, C, C++, Hadoop, Hivefamiliarity with map-reduce algorithms, a/b testing methods, big data solutionsgreat written, online and verbal communication skills Applicants will be good at identifying and solving optimization and data management issues in production services without a lot of supervision and be willing to make suggestions and take direction when needed. Humor, creativity, curiosity and innovation will be highly valued.  Simpli.fi offers challenging big-data problems in a thriving international display advertising business and has a diverse and widely distributed workforce with many individual working from home and connecting with their colleagues using Skype and email. Position is full time with full benefits package. Compensation will be commensurate with experience and education and is negotiable — make us an offer.  Please send your resume to jobs@simpli.fi to begin the process
